refnamediv.refpurpose: Waits until DSP task is completed.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function waits (blocks Scilab console) until end of the DSP application execution.

listitem.para: timeout: Amount of time in seconds to wait (-1 - wait indefinitely)

refsection.title: Examples

simplelist.member: mdaqDSPBuild : Builds DSP application from provided Xcos model
mdaqDSPRead : Reads data from DSP task
